mapper.update:
update studententer
stuid = #{stuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stuname = #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tname = #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoicenumber = #{invoicenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cateid = #{cateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
catename = #{catename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

majorname = #{majorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

iscard = #{iscard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signtime = #{signtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and term_id = #{termId}

update studententer set stuid = #{stuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stuname = #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tname = #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoicenumber = #{invoicenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cateid = #{cateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, catename = #{catename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, majorid = #{majorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, majorname = #{majorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classid = #{classid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classname = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iscard = #{iscard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signtime = #{signtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update studententer
stuname = #{stuname},
tid = #{tid},
tname = #{tname},
invoicenumber = #{invoicenumber},
cateid = #{cateid},
catename = #{catename},
majorid = #{majorid},
majorname = #{majorname},
classid = #{classid},
classname = #{classname},
fee = #{fee},
iscard = #{iscard},
signtime = #{signtime},
where stuid = #{stuid}
and term_id = #{termId}
mapper.select: select from studententer where stuid = #{existStu} and term_id = #{termId}

mapper.delete: delete from studententer where stuid = #{existStu} and term_id = #{termId}
